item.title: Seminar: Hard Moves, Reactions, Consequences, and Devil's Bargains
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MlbOA2fm6VeLensstwM

@swordqueen, @Sandy, and @edige23 will be talking about GM reactions-- costs, consequences, hard moves, soft moves, turning things back on the player and more. This will be Thursday 10/14 at 2300 Eastern time. We plan on 60 minutes of talk, plus up to 30 minutes of Q&A if we have attendees. We ask that attendees mute and turn off their audio. This session will be recorded for later posting.

The Zoom meeting link is
Topic: Hard Moves Seminar
Time: Oct 14, 2021 11:00 PM Eastern Time (US and Canada)
